name: Amazon Amplify
short: A set of tools and services for developing and deploying cloud-powered mobile and web applications.
description: Amazon Amplify is an AWS service that simplifies the development of cloud-based applications. It provides a set of tools and services that allow developers to quickly create, configure, and deploy cloud-based applications. It offers features such as authentication, authorization, hosting, API gateway, analytics, and more. Amplify provides an intuitive UI for configuring services, and allows developers to focus on creating the logic for their app, rather than managing infrastructure.
